items.title: Exciting suno mashup feature added in Platform Service ðŸŽ‰
items.summary: This update introduces a new suno mashup feature, enhancing audio processing capabilities. Key modifications include the addition of the ACTION_MASHUP in core and audio handler files, along with updates to the settings. These changes aim to improve user experience and expand functionality within the Platform Service.

items.summary: This update modifies the poetry configuration in the pyproject.toml file. The change involves updating the dev-dependencies section to a new format, which enhances compatibility and organization. This adjustment is expected to streamline the development process.
